rukus.text: 74|32|avvaru alla! Niccayamaka cantiran mitu cattiyamaka
74|33|celkinra iravin mitu cattiyamaka
74|34|veliccamakum vitiyarkalai mitu cattiyamaka
74|35|niccayamaka atu (narakam) mikap periya kariyankalil onrakum
74|36|atu, manitarkalukku accamutti eccarikkai ceykiratu
74|37|unkalil evan (atanalavil) muntic cellavo allatu (atai vittum) vilakik kollavo virumpukirano avan avvaru ceyyavum
74|38|ovvoru manitanum, tan ceyyum ceyalukke pinaiyaliyaka irukkiran
74|39|Ayinum, (evarkalutaiya ceyaletu valatu kaiyil kotukkappattato avarkal) valatu pakkattil iruppavarkal
74|40|avarkal corkkattil iruntukontu, kurravalikalai nokki, ‘‘unkalai ‘cakar' narakattil pukuttiyatu etu?'' Enru ketparkal
74|41|avarkal corkkattil iruntukontu, kurravalikalai nokki, ‘‘unkalai ‘cakar' narakattil pukuttiyatu etu?'' Enru ketparkal
74|42|avarkal corkkattil iruntukontu, kurravalikalai nokki, ‘‘unkalai ‘cakar' narakattil pukuttiyatu etu?'' Enru ketparkal
74|43|atarkavarkal kuruvarkal: ‘‘Nankal tolavillai
74|44|nankal elaikalukku unavalikkavillai
74|45|vinana kariyankalil mulkik kitantavarkalutan nankalum mulkik kitantom
74|46|kuli kotukkum innalaiyum nankal poyyakkinom
74|47|(nankal maranittu) itai urutiyakak kanum varai (ivvare iruntom). ''(Ivvaru ‘cakar' narakavacikal kuruvarkal)
74|48|akave, (avarkalukkakap) parintu pecum evarutaiya ciparicum, anraiya tinam avarkalukku oru payanumalikkatu
74|49|avarkalukku enna nerntatu? Innallupatecattai (ivvaru) purakkanikkinranar
74|50|veruntotum (kattuk) kalutaiyaippol avarkal irukkinranar
74|51|atuvum, cinkattaik kantu veruntotum (kalutaiyaip pol otukinranar)
74|52|(itumattuma?) Avarkalil ovvoruvanum, virittu otappatum oru vetam tanakkum kotukkappata ventum enru virumpukiran
74|53|avvaru orukalum natakkappovatillai. Maraka ivarkal marumaiyaip parri payappatuvateyillai
74|54|avvaru orukalum natakkap povatillai. Niccayamaka itu oru nallupatecame akum
74|55|(nallupatecam pera) virumpiyavan itai napakattil vaittuk kollavum
74|56|Allah natinal tavira, avarkal nallupatecam pera mutiyatu.(Pataippinankal) ancuvatarku avane takutiyanavan, (pataippinankalai) mannippatarkum avane takutiyanavan
